title: Vapamore MR-100 PRIMO Steam Cleaning System - Features
description: Primo - The Italian word for "first" is the basis for Vapamore's philosophy. Vapamore's MR-100 Primo Steam Cleaning System is the first steamer of its kind, applying the innovations and features requested by customers to deliver a high performance steam cleaner. Powerful cleaning performance, minimal maintenance, intuitive design and ergonomic construction come together in the MR-100 to make it easy to clean the house and eliminate germs, dirt, stains and more. Vapamore's total dedication to customer satisfaction make them the first choice in quality steam cleaning products.

asset.author: CPO Outlets
asset.description:
Visit us at http://cpooutlets.com/vpmnmr-100/vpmnmr-100,default,pd.html?ref=CPOYoutube to learn more about the MR-100 PRIMO Steam Cleaning System from Vapamore!

Primo - The Italian word for "first" is the basis for Vapamore's philosophy. Vapamore's MR-100 Primo Steam Cleaning System is the first steamer of its kind, applying the innovations and features requested by customers to deliver a high performance steam cleaner. Powerful cleaning performance, minimal maintenance, intuitive design and ergonomic construction come together in the MR-100 to make it easy to clean the house and eliminate germs, dirt, stains and more. Vapamore's total dedication to customer satisfaction make them the first choice in quality steam cleaning products.

transcripts: Vapamore's newest steam cleaner the MR 100 Primo is an all new upgrade of the original MR 100. The new Primo was designed from the ground up based on years of consumer feedback resulting in the best steam cleaner of its kind. the new Primo features include a new exclusive patented style and ergonomic design with a sturdy chassis featuring an internal insulated heat shield for efficient heating and safety. intuitive operation with two new indicator lights and easy to read labeling. A semi Italian made solenoid to eliminate water and condensation build up in the steam hose. No perching is required. New and improved accessories and attachments that twist and lock securely in place. Stronger extension tubes with a storage hook for quick and easy set up and storage. A dual sided microfiber floor cleaning cloth with insulated thermal core. All-new scraper tool and large nylon brush accessories. Newly designed accessory adapter and detail tip along with a surface squeegee and clothes steam adapter combined into one accessory. A comfortable padded steam gun handle grip. Solid rubberized wheels, and 18 foot retractable power cord, large hinged  accessory compartment, a balanced carrying handle with rubber grip, exclusive vapamore lifetime warranty. All this combined with vapamore's high level of customer and product support to make the MR 100 Primo, hands down, the best steam cleaner available.
